summary: A save file of my current character, Lynda Audgunnr
descriptionHtml:
Here is a save file of my current character, Lynda Audgunnr. She is around lvl 23.
Beware as this savefile is some way in the game, having started on \"Elder Knowledge\" and is about to go to the College of Winterhold. I have also completed several other sidequests, having wiped out the Dark Brotherhood, completed \"The Book of Love\" and \"The Heart of Dibella\", amongst many other quests i do not remember. 

Sadly, i do not have any earlier saves, i have deleted them. If possible, you could try to use a FaceGen Exchanger(if one exists for Skyrim).

Now, i am using a couple of mods to get the appearance Lynda has.
     For her armor i use armdude\'s Neutralized Blades Gear, aswell as fireundubh\'s I Put A Spell On You - More Enchanting Options(I enchanted the boots and glove myself even though i have little skill in enchanting).
     For her weapons i use 747823\'s Weapons of the Third Era, and the hood is from doomfunk\'s Deadly Serious Shrouded Armor.

I don\'t use any body mods, however, i am using a face mod, and here is where the tricky part is. I\'m not sure which face mod it is. I believe it to be Better Females by Bella, but again, i\'m not certain. Experiment with different face mods and find one you like, thats what i did.

Cheers

Note that this does not contain any of the mods, just a save file. All credits go the the creators of the mods.

Neutralized Blades Gear:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1288

I Put A Spell On You - More Enchanting Options:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3313

Weapons of the Third Era:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3871

Deadly Serious Shrouded Armor:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2260

Better Females by Bella:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812#
author: Kinuko
